long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create custom navigation redirects for any website of your choosing.

With Re-Nav you set up matchers to detect which URLs you want to redirect, and then you define where you want to be redirected based on that matcher.

A variety of other WebExtensions exist that do redirecting for specific sets of websites, while Re-Nav takes it to another level and puts you in the driver seat.
